title: PMS 2.0 371 - March Madness Is Here, Jordan Poyer, Adrian Peterson, Maurice Jones-Drew, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys chat about Massacre week continuing, with the Chiefs releasing both of their starting tackle, other players being let go, an oddsmaker in Vegas raising the Bears' Super Bowl odds potentially tipping off Russell Wilson going to the Bears, and they monitor the start of all the conference tournaments going on. Joining the program is Buffalo Bills starting Safety, Jordan Poyer to chat about being apart of one of the best safety tandems in the NFL with Micah Hyde, going from a losing team and culture and creating one in Buffalo, his athletic prowess growing up, why he thinks Josh Allen should get every dollar he earns and much more (26:23-47:30). Next, joining Pat and AJ Hawk is 7x All-Pro, 7X Pro Bowler, 2012 NFL MVP, 2012 NFL OPOY, member of the 2010's All-Decade team, one of the greatest RB's of all-time and current free agent, Adrian Peterson, to chat about his prospects for the future, how he's managed to keep his body in the shape he has, where he would like to play next year, his handshake, and much more (1:12:23-1:26:44). Later, 3x All-Pro, 3x Pro Bowler, NFL Network analyst and friend of the program, Maurice Jones-Drew joins the show to chat about all the different guys getting cut, what he thinks about the future in Jacksonville, and he and Pat place a little wager (1:29:01-1:39:54). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
